item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(Orange) ## Tree age circumference ## 3:7 Min. : 118.0 Min. : 30.0 ## 1:7 1st Qu.: 484.0 1st Qu.: 65.5 ## 5:7 Median :1004.0 Median :115.0 ## 2:7 Mean : 922.
